text: @Feargal_Sharkey @EnvAgency The @EnvAgency are  negligent as are the offenders. Automatic fines. Automatic fines. Excruciating large automatic fines. Just build it that way. You pollute. You are fined. No debate. For repeats, fine goes up by factor of 100. No arbitration. Get fucking real.

The North West Regional Flood and Coastal Committee is refreshing its business plan and invites you to express your views!

You can do so by completing the Community Survey on our website here: https://t.co/oOhvZRE5C9 

#flooding #floodrisk #floodaware
@EnvAgencyNW https://t.co/dh60jxxGfM
